Download the TubeMQ releases

Use the links below to download the Apache TubeMQ from one of our mirrors.

TubeMQ

Date Version Comment Downloads
October. 21th, 2020 0.6.0 Source [SRC] [PGP] [SHA512]
Client [TAR] [PGP] [SHA512]
Server [TAR] [PGP] [SHA512]

Release Notes

New Features

  • [TUBEMQ-319] In the pull mode, consumers support the suspension of consumption for a certain partition
  • [TUBEMQ-3] C++ SDK support in TubeMQ

IMPROVEMENTS

  • [TUBEMQ-311] Feedback more production information
  • [TUBEMQ-312] Feedback more consumption information
  • [TUBEMQ-325] Add 406 ~ 408 error code to pullSelect call
  • [TUBEMQ-345] Optimize the call logic of getMessage() in Pull mode
  • [TUBEMQ-352] Set the parameters of the example at startup
  • [TUBEMQ-353] Update LICENSE about C/C++ SDK's code reference
  • [TUBEMQ-356] C++ SDK Codec decode add requestid
  • [TUBEMQ-327] Fix the concurrency problem in the example

BUG FIXES

  • [TUBEMQ-316] Where the port the port is aleady used, the process throw the exception, but not exit
  • [TUBEMQ-317] The Store Manager throws java.lang.NullPointerException
  • [TUBEMQ-320] Request for static web contents would get responses with no content
  • [TUBEMQ-354] Found a dns translate bug in C/C++ sdk
  • [TUBEMQ-306] Raise Nullpointer Exception when create tubemq instance
  • [TUBEMQ-359] TubeMQ consume speed dropped to 0 in some partitions, it is a very serious bug Blocker
